<a0>2D Graphics</a0> — How to display and print 2D graphics in applications.
<a0>2D Graphics</a0> - 如何在应用程序中显示和打印 2D 图形。

<a0><i1/> <b2>A Closer Look at "Hello World!"</b2></a0> 讨论 "Hello World!" 应用程序，详细描述每个代码段。
<a0><i1/> <b2>Annotations</b2></a0> are a form of metadata and provide information for the compiler.
<a0><i1/> <b2>Annotations</b2></a0> 是一种元数据形式，为编译器提供信息。
<a0><i1/> <b2>Classes and Objects</b2></a0> describes how to write the classes from which objects are created, and how to create and use the objects.
<a0><i1/> <b2>Classes and Objects</b2></a0> 描述了如何编写创建对象的类，以及如何创建和使用对象。

<a0><i1/> <b2>Generics</b2></a0> are a powerful feature of the Java programming language.
<a0><i1/> <b2>Generics</b2></a0> 是 Java 编程语言的一个强大功能。
<a0><i1/> <b2>Interfaces and Inheritance</b2></a0> describes interfaceswhat they are, why you would want to write one, and how to write one.
<a0><i1/> <b2>Interfaces and Inheritance</b2></a0> 描述了接口，它们是什么，为什么要编写一个，以及如何编写一个接口。
<a0><i1/> <b2>Language Basics</b2></a0> describes the traditional features of the language, including variables, arrays, data types, operators, and control flow.
<a0><i1/> <b2>Language Basics</b2></a0> 描述了该语言的传统功能，包括变量，数组，数据类型，运算符和控制流。
<a0><i1/> <b2>Numbers and Strings</b2></a0> This lesson describes how to use <c3>Number</c3> and <c4>String</c4> objects The lesson also shows you how to format data for output.
<a0><i1/> <b2>Numbers and Strings</b2></a0> 该课程描述如何使用 <c3>Number</c3> 和 <c4>String</c4> 对象，也为你显示如何格式化数据输出。
<a0><i1/> <b2>Object-Oriented Programming Concepts</b2></a0> teaches you the core concepts behind object-oriented programming: objects, messages, classes, and inheritance.
<a0><i1/> <b2>Object-Oriented Programming Concepts</b2></a0> 教你面向对象编程背后的核心概念：对象，消息，类和继承。
<a0><i1/> <b2>Packages</b2></a0> are a feature of the Java programming language that help you to organize and structure your classes and their relationships to one another.
<a0><i1/> <b2>Packages</b2></a0> 是 Java 编程语言的一个功能，可帮助您组织和构建类和它们之间的关系。
<a0><i1/> <b2>The "Hello World!" Application</b2></a0> This hands-on approach describes what to download, what to install, and what to type, for creating a simple "Hello World!" application.
<a0><i1/> <b2>The "Hello World!" Application</b2></a0> 这种动手方式描述了要创建一个简单的 "Hello World!" 应用要下载什么内容，要安装什么以及要输入什么。

<a0>Collections</a0> — Lessons on using and extending the Java Collections Framework.
<a0>Collections</a0> - 使用和扩展 Java 集合框架的课程。
<a0>Creating a GUI With JFC/Swing</a0>: Once you know how to create applications or applets, follow this trail to learn how to create their user interfaces.
<a0>Creating a GUI With JFC/Swing</a0>：一旦您知道如何创建应用程序或小程序，请按照此线索学习如何创建其用户界面。
<a0>Creating a GUI with Swing</a0> — A comprehensive introduction to GUI creation on the Java platform.

<a0>Creating a JavaFX GUI</a0> — A collection of JavaFX tutorials.
<a0>Creating a JavaFX GUI</a0> - 一组 JavaFX 教程。
<a0>Custom Networking</a0> — An introduction to the Java platform's powerful networking features.
<a0>Custom Networking</a0> - 介绍 Java 平台强大的网络功能。
<a0>Custom Networking</a0>: If you're interested in writing applications or applets that use the network, follow this trail.
<a0>Custom Networking</a0>：如果您有兴趣编写使用网络的应用程序或小应用程序，请遵循以下路径。
<a0>Date-Time APIs</a0> — How to use the <t1>java.time</t1> pages to write date and time code.
<a0>Date-Time APIs</a0> - 如何使用 <t1>java.time</t1> 页编写日期和时间代码。
<a0>Deployment</a0> — How to package applications and applets using JAR files, and deploy them using Java Web Start and Java Plug-in.
<a0>Deployment</a0> - 如何使用 JAR 文件打包应用程序和 applet，并使用 Java Web Start 和 Java 插件部署它们。
<a0>Essential Classes</a0>: By taking this trail, you can find out about strings, exceptions, threads, and other Java features that are used in all kinds of Java programs.
<a0>Essential Classes</a0>：通过这一步，您可以了解用于各种 Java 程序的字符串，异常，线程和其他 Java 功能。
<a0>Essential Classes</a0>: Learn about the most-used classes in the JDK APIs including <c1>String</c1>, <c2>System</c2>, <c3>Thread</c3> and the classes in <c4>java.io</c4>.
<a0>Essential Classes</a0>：了解 JDK API 中最常用的类，包括 <c1>String</c1>，<c2>System</c2>，<c3>Thread</c3> 和 <c4>java.io</c4> 中的类。
<a0>Essential Java Classes</a0> — Lessons on exceptions, basic input/output, concurrency, regular expressions, and the platform environment.
<a0>Essential Java Classes</a0> - 关于异常，基本输入/输出，并发，正则表达式和平台环境的课程。
<a0>Full-Screen Exclusive Mode API</a0> — How to write applications that more fully utilize the user's graphics hardware.
<a0>Full-Screen Exclusive Mode API</a0> - 如何编写更充分利用用户图形硬件的应用程序。
<a0>Generics</a0> — An enhancement to the type system that supports operations on objects of various types while providing compile-time type safety.
<a0>Generics</a0> - 对类型系统的增强，支持对各种类型对象的操作，同时提供编译时类型安全性。
<a0>Getting Started</a0> — An introduction to Java technology and lessons on installing Java development software and using it to create a simple program.
<a0>Getting Started</a0> - Java 技术的介绍以入安装 Java 开发软件并使用它创建简单程序的课程。
<a0>Home Page</a0> > <a1>Learning the Java Language</a1> > <a2>Object-Oriented Programming Concepts</a2>

<a0>Internationalization</a0> — An introduction to designing software so that it can be easily adapted (localized) to various languages and regions.
<a0>Internationalization</a0> - 介绍设计软件的方法，使其可以轻松适应(本地化)到各种语言和地区。
<a0>JAXB</a0> — Introduces the Java architecture for XML Binding (JAXB) technology.
<a0>JAXB</a0> - 介绍用于 XML 绑定(JAXB)技术的 Java 体系结构。
<a0>JAXP</a0> — Introduces the Java API for XML Processing (JAXP) technology.
<a0>JAXP</a0> - 介绍用于 XML 处理的 Java API(JAXP)技术。
<a0>JDBC Database Access</a0> — Introduces an API for connectivity between the Java applications and a wide range of databases and data sources.
<a0>JDBC Database Access</a0> - 介绍用于 Java 应用程序和各种数据库和数据源之间连接的 API。
<a0>JMX</a0>— Java Management Extensions provides a standard way of managing resources such as applications, devices, and services.
<a0>JMX</a0> - Java Management Extensions 提供了管理资源（如应用程序，设备和服务）的标准方法。
<a0>JNDI</a0>— Java Naming and Directory Interface enables accessing the Naming and Directory Service such as DNS and LDAP.
<a0>JNDI</a0> - Java 命名和目录接口允许访问命名和目录服务，例如 DNS 和 LDAP。
<a0>Learning the Java Language</a0> — Lessons describing the essential concepts and features of the Java Programming Language.
<a0>Learning the Java Language</a0> - 描述 Java 编程语言基本概念和功能的课程。
<a0>Learning the Java Language</a0>: This trail is a gentle introduction to object-oriented concepts and how the Java language implements them.
<a0>Learning the Java Language</a0>：这个路径是对面向对象概念的一种温和的介绍，以及 Java 语言如何实现它们。
<a0>Preparation for Java Programming Language Certification</a0> — List of available training and tutorial resources.
<a0>Preparation for Java Programming Language Certification</a0> - 可用的培训和教程资源列表。
<a0>RMI</a0> — The Remote Method Invocation API allows an object to invoke methods of an object running on another Java Virtual Machine.
<a0>RMI</a0> - 远程方法调用 API 允许对象调用在另一个 Java 虚拟机上运行的对象的方法。
<a0>Reflection</a0> — An API that represents ("reflects") the classes, interfaces, and objects in the current Java Virtual Machine.
<a0>Reflection</a0> - 表示("反射")当前 Java 虚拟机中的类，接口和对象的 API。
<a0>Security</a0> — Java platform features that help protect applications from malicious software.
<a0>Security</a0> - 有助于保护应用程序免受恶意软件攻击的 Java 平台功能。
<a0>Sockets Direct Protocol</a0> — How to enable the Sockets Direct Protocol to take advantage of InfiniBand.
<a0>Sockets Direct Protocol</a0> - 如何启用套接字直接协议以利用 InfiniBand。
<a0>Sound</a0> — An API for playing sound data from applications.
<a0>Sound</a0> - 用于播放应用程序声音数据的 API。
<a0>The Extension Mechanism</a0> — How to make custom APIs available to all applications running on the Java platform.
<a0>The Extension Mechanism</a0> - 如何使自定义 API 可用于在 Java 平台上运行的所有应用程序。
<a0>The Java Tutorials' Blog</a0> has news and updates about the Java SE tutorials.
<a0>The Java Tutorials' Blog</a0> 有关于 Java SE 教程的新闻和更新。

<c1>null</c1> may be assigned to any variable, except variables of primitive types.
可以将 <c1>null</c1> 分配给任何变量，但基本类型的变量除外。
<c2>true</c2>, <c3>false</c3>, and <c4>null</c4> might seem like keywords, but they are actually literals; you cannot use them as identifiers in your programs.
<c2>true</c2>，<c3>false</c3> 和 <c4>null</c4> 可能看起来像关键字，但它们实际上是 literals（字面量）;你不能在程序中使用它们作为标识符。
<c3>String</c3> objects are <i4>immutable</i4>, which means that once created, their values cannot be changed.
<c3>String</c3> 对象是 <i4>immutable（不可变的）</i4>，这意味着一旦创建，它们的值就不能改变。

<i0>Control flow statements</i0>, however, break up the flow of execution by employing decision making, looping, and branching, enabling your program to <i1>conditionally</i1> execute particular blocks of code.
但是，<i0>Control flow statements（控制流程语句）</i0>通过使用决策，循环和分支来分解执行流程，从而使程序 <i1>有条件地</i1> 执行特定的代码块。
<s0>Application Programming Interface (API)</s0>: The API provides the core functionality of the Java programming language.
<s0>Application Programming Interface (API)</s0>：API 提供了 Java 编程语言的核心功能。
<s0>Avoid platform dependencies</s0>: You can keep your program portable by avoiding the use of libraries written in other languages.
<s0>Avoid platform dependencies</s0>：您可以通过避免使用其他语言编写的库来保持程序的可移植性。

<s0>Class Variables (Static Fields)</s0> A <i1>class variable</i1> is any field declared with the <c2>static</c2> modifier; this tells the compiler that there is exactly one copy of this variable in existence, regardless of how many times the class has been instantiated.
<s0>Class Variables (Static Fields)类变量（静态字段）</s0> <i1>class variable（类变量）</i1> 是用 <c2>static</c2> 修饰符声明的任何字段;这告诉编译器，这个变量只有一个副本存在，而不管该类实例化了多少次。
<s0>Deployment Technologies</s0>: The JDK software provides standard mechanisms such as the Java Web Start software and Java Plug-In software for deploying your applications to end users.
<s0>Deployment Technologies</s0>：JDK 软件提供标准机制，例如用于将应用程序部署到最终用户的 Java Web Start 软件和 Java Plug-In 软件。
<s0>Develop programs more quickly</s0>: The Java programming language is simpler than C++, and as such, your development time could be up to twice as fast when writing in it.
<s0>Develop programs more quickly</s0>：Java 编程语言比 C ++更简单，因此编写它时，开发时间可能会快两倍。
<s0>Development Tools</s0>: The development tools provide everything you'll need for compiling, running, monitoring, debugging, and documenting your applications.
<s0>Development Tools</s0>：开发工具提供编译，运行，监控，调试和记录应用程序所需的一切。
<s0>Distribute software more easily</s0>: With Java Web Start software, users will be able to launch your applications with a single click of the mouse.
<s0>Distribute software more easily</s0>：使用 Java Web Start 软件，用户只需单击一下鼠标即可启动您的应用程序。

<s0>Get started quickly</s0>: Although the Java programming language is a powerful object-oriented language, it's easy to learn, especially for programmers already familiar with C or C++.
<s0>Get started quickly</s0>：尽管 Java 编程语言是一种功能强大的面向对象语言，但它很容易学习，特别是对于已经熟悉 C 或 C ++的程序员而言。
<s0>Instance Variables (Non-Static Fields)</s0> Technically speaking, objects store their individual states in "non-static fields", that is, fields declared without the <c1>static</c1> keyword.
<s0>Instance Variables (Non-Static Fields) 实例变量（非静态字段）</s0> 从技术上讲，对象将它们各自的状态存储在 "非静态字段" 中，即在没有 <c1>static</c1> 关键字的情况下声明的字段。

<s0>Integration Libraries</s0>: Integration libraries such as the Java IDL API, JDBC API, Java Naming and Directory Interface (JNDI) API, Java RMI, and Java Remote Method Invocation over Internet Inter-ORB Protocol Technology (Java RMI-IIOP Technology) enable database access and manipulation of remote objects.

<s0>Local Variables</s0> Similar to how an object stores its state in fields, a method will often store its temporary state in <i1>local variables</i1>.
<s0>Local Variables（局部变量）</s0> 类似于一个对象如何在字段中存储它的状态，一个方法通常会将它的临时状态存储在 <i1>local variables</i1> 中。

<s0>Write better code</s0>: The Java programming language encourages good coding practices, and automatic garbage collection helps you avoid memory leaks.
<s0>Write better code</s0>：Java 编程语言鼓励良好的编码实践，并且自动垃圾收集可帮助您避免内存泄漏。
